name: Rest Quest
description:
Our cursed hero has lived for a long time- and he's fed up with it. Hearing rumors of a panacea that could cure his immortality, he set out on a quest to find peace deep in the halls of a forgotten lich's tomb. Lacking any notable skills except for his prodigious leaps, he's prepared to die as many times as it takes.

Can be played on controller or keyboard (controller recommended) with left/right controls and space/triangle for jump. Hold jump for bonus air! Use precise bounces with your momentum on spikes and skeletons to navigate this dungeon.

Made for Weekly Game Jam 130. This is the first game I've made and any feedback and criticism is appreciated, thanks!
